Package org.opengis.cite.geomatics.time

package org.opengis.cite.geomatics.time
Provides classes for operating on temporal data. Temporal values may be simple text-based representations based on ISO 8601 or XML Schema Part 2. XML representations based on GML temporal primitives are also recognized.
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    org.opengis.cite.geomatics
     
    org.opengis.cite.geomatics.gml
    Contains classes for operating on GML (3.2.1) geometry representations.
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    TemporalComparator
    Compares temporal objects according to their relative position in time.
    TemporalUtils
    Provides various utility methods that apply to representations of temporal objects.
